processes.name: MySQL Connectivity
processes.description:
Test connectivity with MySQL.
This activity is not mandatory to use here.

processes.name: MySQL Source Table
processes.description:
SELECT/Copy data from the source table.
In this activity, data from the old table is selected, while limiting it to 10 records for the sake of speed.

processes.name: MySQL Destination table
processes.description:
Load data from the old table to the new one.
Writing the data to the destination table requires use of the Code layer. The results of the previous Action is used in this action.
